rows.label: tlk41200151_02_msg0001
rows.name:
It's been quite a while since my older brother
Elnoth went to Superbia.

rows.label: tlk41200151_02_msg0002
rows.name:
I hope my older brother isn't pushing himself
too hard and getting sick...

rows.label: tlk41200151_02_msg0003
rows.name:
They say being a Driver in the Superbian
Imperial Army is tough...

rows.label: tlk41200151_02_msg0004
rows.name:
...It would be so sad if he died,
like Mom did back then.
